ch0196_10_fleurdelis/0101_0701_02_10:
Let us head out in search of an even more
beautiful world.
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/7101_0701_01_10:
This sygna suit expresses both my conviction and
Volcanion’s.
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/7101_0701_02_10:
Passionate, intensely burning flame...
Calm, fluid flowing water...
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/7101_0701_03_10: These are manifestations of our beliefs.
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/7102_0701_01_10: Power is not a thing to be used for selfish desires.
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/7102_0701_02_10:
There are far too many fools who do not grasp
this. It’s truly a disgrace...
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/7103_0701_01_10:
My beliefs about power are very similar to those
of my partner Volcanion.
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/7103_0701_02_10: It’s for that reason the two of us joined forces.
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/7104_0701_01_10:
The flame of Professor Sycamore’s conviction has
not yet gone out.
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/7104_0701_02_10:
However, I cannot say for sure whether that will
always be the case. The future is not yet written,
after all...
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/7105_0701_01_10:
I’m sure that from your perspective,
[Name:PlayerNickname ], my way of thinking
is difficult to understand.
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/7105_0701_02_10:
I don’t feel the need for others to understand
my beliefs.
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/7105_0701_03_10:
Whether I’m understood or not, I WILL create
a beautiful world!
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/1701_0701_01_10:
You came at the perfect time. I have something
to give you.
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/1701_0702_01_10: It’s important to share with others.
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/1701_0702_02_10:
Be careful not to find yourself always taking.
Ensure you’re also able to give.
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2501_0701_01_10:
Do you know about mechanisms that make use of
steam power?
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2501_0701_02_10:
Steam has been used as a source of power
since long ago. One example of that would
be the Geothermal Power Plant in Alola.
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2501_0701_03_10:
Without such mechanisms, I find it unlikely human
civilization would have developed to the extent
it has...
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2501_0702_01_10: Energy is needed to produce steam.
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2501_0702_02_10:
To create this energy, something else must be
sacrificed.
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2501_0702_03_10:
There is even less time remaining for us than
you think...
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2511_0701_01_10:
The world is truly beautiful. However, there are
foolish humans that let that beauty go to waste.
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2511_0701_02_10:
I cannot stand the existence of so many fools who
think only of themselves.
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2511_0702_01_10:
The truth is that while there are many foolish
humans, there are also quite a few chosen ones.
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2511_0702_02_10:
In light of that, I have decided to give the foolish
people of this world a brief reprieve.
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/2511_0702_03_10:
First, I want to observe you and the other chosen
ones to see if you indeed have the power to
change the future...
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/3001_0701_01_10:
The break of dawn is a truly beautiful thing.
Regrettably, it is also the signal for foolish humans
to begin their day.
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/3003_0701_01_10:
Do you have a vision? As a human who lives in
this world, you too should be thinking about
the future.
ch0196_10_fleurdelis/3005_0701_01_10:
Night is the perfect time to quietly ponder things.
Let’s think about the future together.
